validation.rule.email: Field '%s' must be a valid email address
validation.rule.sql: Field '%s' contains potentially dangerous content (SQL injection)
validation.rule.minlen: Field '%s' must be at least %v characters
validation.rule.maxlen: Field '%s' must be at most %v characters
validation.rule.url: Field '%s' must be a valid URL
validation.rule.phone: Field '%s' must be a valid phone number
validation.rule.alphanum: Field '%s' must contain only alphanumeric characters
validation.rule.alpha: Field '%s' must contain only alphabetic characters
